title: New: French For Rabbits – Goat
content:
Hat-tip to the ever fantastic Dance Yourself Clean for putting me onto French For Rabbits (that repost feature on Soundcloud works wonders).

Slightly Marling-y in parts, Goat is described by the duo as “a lament on stubbornness and being sorry.” and it certainly feels like a song written by someone constantly blaming themselves for the failings of a relationship. Check out Goat below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
